description: O-RAG evaluation qrels - consolidated query-document relevance judgments

qrels.prompt: When was the last time I talked to Jayant, and what did we discuss?
qrels.user_intent: Recall last 1x1 meeting with specific person
qrels.expected_answer: October 15, 2025 - Intent swim lanes meeting discussing Swim lane 2 tasks (entity list, query data, eval plan). Jayant working with Kosta and Ayush on wiki.

judgments.reason: Most recent meeting mentioning Jayant - Intent swim lanes discussion

qrels.notes: October 15, 2025 Intent swim lanes meeting is the most recent daily note linking to Jayant.

qrels.prompt: I had a meeting with Brian, and he asked about evals for photo styles, where's the link to the disc hub page for that?
qrels.user_intent: Find specific URL mentioned in meeting

judgments.reason: Contains the Discovery Hub link for photo styles eval
Hub page for photo styles program

qrels.notes: November 20, 2025 note explicitly mentions 'photo style understanding model eval is up in discovery Hub' with the link.

qrels.prompt: Who was working on the transformer based relevance improvements to AdobeOne?
qrels.user_intent: Find person working on specific technical project
qrels.expected_answer: Feng bin - has a project to fine tune AdobeOne V2 for failure cases, transformer based ranking

judgments.reason: Contains mention of Feng bin's transformer-based ranking project

qrels.notes: Found in Ritu 1x1 meeting notes on November 19, 2025.

qrels.user_intent: Find product manager for specific product
qrels.initial_search_query: PsM PM Photoshop Mobile product manager

judgments.reason: Person page explicitly stating 'Photoshop Mobile PM'
Contains PM contact info for Photoshop

qrels.notes: Michael Lewis person page and Photoshop.md both provide this answer.

qrels.prompt: Who should I ping for a question about Lr desktop?
qrels.user_intent: Find contact for product questions
additional_queries_needed: LrD Lr Desktop contact Rithesh Vic Anuj

judgments.reason: Hub page for Lightroom program - doesn't identify LrD lead
Desktop rollout planning page - doesn't identify LrD lead

qrels.notes: Correct answer is Benjamin Warde but vault doesn't explicitly identify him as LrD lead. He is mentioned in vault but not with this role.

qrels.prompt: What is the current LrD rollout date for semantic search?
qrels.user_intent: Find project timeline
qrels.initial_search_query: LrD semantic search rollout date desktop April 2026

judgments.reason: Contains link to LrD GA April 2026 wiki

qrels.notes: Both Lr Desktop Rollout.md and Lr Home.md confirm April 2026 target.

qrels.prompt: What are the Q1 Must nails?
qrels.user_intent: Find quarterly priorities
qrels.expected_answer: Recs: Styles (icons/design assets, photo model), PsW stock content, DC Recs 100% rollout. Lr: LrD query strategy & migration plan. Intent/QU: Use case in prod (CKG4 + New MM model)

judgments.chunk_id: Notes/Periodic Notes/Daily Notes/November 18, 2025.md::Notes>Q1 2026 Must Nails>[[Recommendations Home|Recs]]
judgments.reason: Contains detailed Q1 2026 Must Nails section
References Q1 Must Nails via transclusion
References Q1 Must Nails via transclusion

qrels.notes: November 18, 2025 is the canonical source with the structured list.

qrels.prompt: When was my last 1x1 with Ayush?
qrels.user_intent: Find most recent meeting with person
qrels.expected_answer: November 13, 2025 - discussed stopping modeling and working on more generalized approach, golden set for MM swimlane 3 isn't correct

judgments.reason: Contains the most recent Ayush 1x1 meeting

qrels.notes: Grep confirmed November 13, 2025 as most recent. Smart search ranked October 22, 2025 higher due to ranking - needed grep to find correct answer.

qrels.prompt: What is the latest on PsW Recs?
qrels.user_intent: Get project status update
qrels.initial_search_query: PsW Recs Photoshop Web Recommendations status
qrels.expected_answer: V1 is contextual stock content recs - keeping Hao focused on hitting this deliverable. PsW stock content is Q1 2026 must nail. Presets and other use cases are follow-on, not V1 scope. PM: Hao Xu.

judgments.reason: Kosta 1x1 confirms Ps Web recs priority, references Q1 must nails

judgments.chunk_id: Notes/Periodic Notes/Daily Notes/November 18, 2025.md::Notes>Q1 2026 Must Nails>[[Recommendations Home|Recs]]
judgments.reason: Lists PsW stock content as must nail - but doesn't clarify V1 scope
Has PM contacts (Hao, Jasper) but doesn't clarify V1 is stock only

qrels.notes: Vault identifies PsW stock content as Q1 must nail but doesn't explicitly state V1 scope is stock-only (not presets). Correct answer requires context that presets/actions are follow-on.

qrels.prompt: Is the new MM model done? Anywhere I can test it?
qrels.user_intent: Check project status and find demo links
qrels.initial_search_query: new MM model multi-modal testing status demo
additional_queries_needed: MintV2 multi-modal model demo devbox test
qrels.expected_answer: Not done - roadmap targets production-ready service by November 28, 2025. Current architecture uses AdobeOneV1 encoder + Llama-1.8B decoder. No current demo links available.

judgments.doc_id: Clippings/Work/Multi-modal Intent and Content Understanding wiki.md
judgments.chunk_id: Clippings/Work/Multi-modal Intent and Content Understanding wiki.md::[Multi-modal Intent and Content Understanding](https://wiki.corp.adobe.com/display/adobesearch/Multi-modal+Intent+and+Content+Understanding)>Summary
judgments.reason: Contains roadmap with November 28, 2025 target date and architecture details

judgments.chunk_id: Notes/Periodic Notes/Daily Notes/October 14, 2025.md::Meetings>Multi Modal intent detection #meetings
judgments.reason: Multi Modal intent detection meeting with technical details (AdobeOne + Llama)

judgments.chunk_id: Notes/Periodic Notes/Daily Notes/November 18, 2025.md::Notes>Q1 2026 Must Nails>Intent / [[Query Understanding|QU]]
judgments.reason: Q1 Must Nails mentions CKG4 + New MM model in prod
Overview page - links to wiki but contains dated demo references
Contains dated Asset/Context to GT demo links (no longer relevant)

qrels.notes: Wiki and Oct 14 meeting have accurate technical details. Intent AI Home and Multimodal intent pages have dated demo links (Asset to GT, Context to GT) that are no longer relevant.
